title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 212.5 - Proper attire of contestants
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 212.5 - Proper attire of contestants

State Regulations
(a) Trunks. Each contestant shall wear mixed martial arts shorts, biker shorts, boxing or
kickboxing shorts during competition as approved by the Commission. Trunks
shall not contain metal zippers or other sharp or hard objects. (b) Shirt or gi. Male contestants may not
wear a shirt or gi during competition. Female contestants shall wear a short
sleeved (above the elbow) or sleeveless form-fitting rash guard and/or sports
bra, and may wear approved chest protection during competition. No
loose-fitting tops are allowed. (c) Shoes. Contestants may not wear shoes or padding on their feet during
competition. Notes

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
